name: Regression (Jonathan Fletcher)
description:
Regression. Your successes are reversible; your failures are not.

Get as high a score as you can, while you can. Move with left/right arrows; jump with space.

 My submission for the One Trick Pony Jam: https://itch.io/jam/one-trick-pony-jam

  • Game jam theme: reversibility
  • Game jam challenge: only use one skill
  • Skill: programming
